title: Introduction to Knowledge Graphs
key_points: Graph databases enable insight at scale
Graph data science extracts insights from knowledge graphs

lessons.title: What are Knowledge Graphs?
points: Knowledge graphs enable insight at scale
Graph databases are the foundation
Organizing principles determine the structure
Choose the best principles for your problems

lessons.title: Knowledge Graph Concepts
points: Graph databases are the foundation for knowledge graphs
Different organizing principles include plain old graphs, property graphs, taxonomies, and ontologies
Existing standards can be used for interoperability
Creating your own organizing principle allows for fine-grained control

lessons.title: Building a Knowledge Graph
points: Use Cypher's CREATE keyword to create data
Graph local queries focus on specific parts of the graph
Functions and procedures can be used in Cypher queries
Understanding Neo4j internals helps optimize performance

lessons.title: Methods of Loading Data
points: Three methods: Neo4j Data Importer, LOAD CSV, neo4j-admin import
Neo4j Data Importer for visual mapping
LOAD CSV for importing CSV data
neo4j-admin import for large datasets

lessons.title: Loading Data Quiz
points: Neo4j Data Importer is a visual tool
LOAD CSV imports CSV data
neo4j-admin import is a fast offline importer
Best practices for data preparation and performance optimization

lessons.title: Loading Data Challenge
points: Apply the appropriate method to load data
Consider data preparation and performance optimization
Follow best practices for loading knowledge graph data

lessons.title: Methods of Integration
points: Integration methods: drivers, functions, APIs, streaming, ETL
Data fabrics provide a connected view
Curating data improves integration and matching rates
Specialized platforms enable broader data fabrics

lessons.title: Integration Methods Quiz
points: Integration methods include drivers, functions, APIs, streaming, ETL
Data fabrics provide a connected view of data
Curating data improves integration and matching rates
Specialized platforms enable broader data fabrics

lessons.title: Integrating Data Challenge
points: Choose the appropriate integration method
Consider data fabrics and specialized platforms
Curate data for improved integration and matching

lessons.title: Introduction to Graph Data Science
points: Graph data science extracts insights
Three categories of graph algorithms
Neo4j Graph Data Science and Cypher
Python API for Graph Data Science

lessons.title: Graph Data Science Quiz
points: Graph data science extracts insights from knowledge graphs
Three categories of graph algorithms: statistical, analytical, machine learning
Neo4j Graph Data Science and Cypher are used for execution
Python API for Graph Data Science allows graph projections and algorithm execution

lessons.title: Graph Data Science Challenge
points: Execute graph algorithms using Neo4j Graph Data Science
Use Cypher for graph projections and algorithm execution
Consider production considerations and enriching the knowledge graph

modules.title: Module 5: Machine Learning with Knowledge Graphs

lessons.title: Machine Learning with Knowledge Graphs
points: ML models can be derived from knowledge graphs
Graph-native ML pipelines and feature engineering
Neo4j Graph Data Science for ML execution
Persisting ML results back into the knowledge graph

lessons.title: Machine Learning Quiz
points: ML models can be derived from knowledge graphs
Graph-native ML pipelines and feature engineering
Neo4j Graph Data Science for ML execution
Persisting ML results back into the knowledge graph

lessons.title: Machine Learning Challenge
points: Create and train an ML model using a knowledge graph
Persist ML results back into the knowledge graph
Consider using external ML tools and platforms

lessons.title: Metadata Knowledge Graphs
points: Metadata knowledge graphs for data governance
Components and querying of metadata knowledge graphs
Connecting data and metadata in a knowledge graph
Semantic search and higher-level use cases

points: Metadata knowledge graphs for data governance
Components and querying of metadata knowledge graphs
Connecting data and metadata in a knowledge graph
Semantic search and higher-level use cases

lessons.title: Metadata Knowledge Graphs Challenge
points: Query metadata knowledge graphs for data discovery and impact analysis
Connect data and metadata in a knowledge graph
Apply semantic search and explore higher-level use cases

lessons.title: Identity Knowledge Graphs
points: Identity is crucial in business systems
Graph-based entity resolution for data integration
Blocking keys and graph algorithms for matching
Case study on Meredith Corporation Identity Graph

points: Identity is crucial in business systems

Blocking keys and graph algorithms for matching

lessons.title: Introduction to Knowledge Lakes
points: Knowledge lakes subsume multiple knowledge graphs

Importance of knowledge graphs and Neo4j
